Definition: The medical action can be used to treat the phenotypic feature indicated by the HPO term in persons with the indicated disease
The medical action can be used to prevent the phenotypic feature indicated by the HPO term in persons with the indicated disease
The medical action can be used to investigate the phenotypic feature indicated by the HPO term in persons with the indicated disease
The medical action should not be used because it may be harmful to persons with the indicated disease
The medical action was applied to persons with the indicated disease without a positive or negative response being observed
